name: TRUMAN
description:
TRUMAN is an arcade & story short game.

This game was designed for mobile and not fully finished, so bugs are expected.

Playing on computer browser is highly recommended for WebGL compatibility.

CREDITS
  • Carles Comas (merk_cat) - Programming
  • Xènia 'Maki' Suñé - Art
  • Carlucho Santana - Music
